price: E, dentre os humanos, há quem discuta acerca de Allah, sem ciência alguma, e siga todo demônio rebelde.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَيَتَّبِعُ كُلَّ شَيۡطَٰنٖ مَّرِيدٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yujādilu fī al-lahi bighayri ʿil'min wayattabiʿu kulla shayṭānin marīdin
